productDetail.title: Emergency Switch IDEC Emergency Switch Button
productDetail.description: A ø30 emergency stop switch that comes in a variety of types. The padlock type lets you lock it in place, while the flash-bezel type has an attractive design. Large number of variations: padlock-supporting type, flash-bezel type, ø60 extra-large type, illuminated type, linked illumination type, and more. Superior safety provided by the same safe-breaking action and safety-potential construction as seen in the ø166 XA/ø22 XW series. The switches naturally conform to all requirements emergency stop switches need, including a direct-opening feature and safety lock.

profilePolicy.tkk: TKK Corporation Public Company Limited respects the privacy rights of visitors and/or users of the website (“Visitors/Website Users”) and is aware of visitors’/website users’ expectation that the information (“Information”) that visitors/website users provide to TKK through this website (“Website”) will be properly protected. TKK therefore announces the Cookies Policy (“Cookies Policy”) for this website.
profilePolicy.smallTextFile: Cookies are small text files made up of letters and numbers that TKK stores on your browser or the hard disk of your computer, tablet or mobile device. TKK may collect information about you through these cookies when you visit our website.
profilePolicy.navigation: These cookies are essential for the website to function and include cookies that enable the website to perform basic functions such as scrolling or to allow visitors to log in and access areas of the website that are reserved for members only. The website will not function properly without the collection of these cookies and TKK is not required to ask for your consent to place these cookies on your device. These cookies do not contain any personally identifiable information.
profilePolicy.details: Details of the different types of TKK cookies that may be used on the website are as follows:
profilePolicy.performanceCookies: These cookies allow TKK to count the number of visitors to the website and the source of those visitors, understand how visitors/users interact with the website, and which pages are most or least popular. By collecting and reporting anonymous and non-specific information to TKK, TKK can improve and provide you with a better website experience. If you do not allow these cookies, TKK will not be able to know when you have visited TKK's website and will not be able to track the performance of the web pages.

serviceDetail.title: Air conditioner cleaning service, hanging type/floor standing type, size 12,000 - 48,000 BTU. Air conditioner cleaning service, hanging type/floor standing type, size 12,000 - 48..
detail: Certified electricians for indoor electrical work
Installation service available only in Bangkok and metropolitan areas
standardFree: Electrical wiring between outdoor and indoor units (up to 10 meters)
standardCost: Cable cover (350 THB per meter, including connector)
Hanging installation (ROD + large rubber) (18-24 kBtu/h) (1,500 THB per set)
Electrical wiring between outdoor and indoor units (up to 10 meters)
serviceArea: Bangkok and metropolitan areas - Samut Prakan, Pathum Thani, Nonthaburi, Bangkok, Samut Sakhon, Nakhon Pathom
Southern region - Songkhla, Yala, Phuket, Phatthalung, Pattani, Narathiwat, Nakhon Si Thammarat, Trang, Chumphon
Central region - Uthai Thani, Sukhothai, Ang Thong, Sing Buri, Samut Songkhram, Lop Buri, Ayutthaya
Eastern region - Rayong, Prachin Buri, Chon Buri, Chachoengsao, Chanthaburi
Northeastern region - Ubon Ratchathani, Udon Thani, Amnat Charoen, Surin, Si Sa Ket, Roi Et, Yasothon, Mukdahan, Nakhon Phanom, Chaiyaphum
note: Installation service covers only one location; relocation requires additional charges
Refrigerant pipe and electrical wiring are installed as surface-mounted only
Working height should not exceed 8 meters; scaffolding rental is the customer's responsibility
Standard equipment cannot be exchanged, deducted, or refunded for cash or discounts
Service is not available in locations that are unsafe for technicians
